'''Adam''' is [[Jack Grossman|Jack Grossman's]] personal assistant.

==History==
Adam was taken Cooper and Pete's parenting class. He was enthusiastic and offered to try things first. At the end of the first session, he confessed to them that he wasn't actually an expectant father. He was attending the class for his boss, who was expecting a baby. They told him that his boss needed to attend the class for himself.

Adam came back to the next session with a recorder. Cooper talked into the recorder, telling Jack that his wife was about to have a baby and he needed to stop sending Adam to do his dirty work. They then sent Adam away from the class.

Adam returned with Jack, who was angry that they'd called him a jackass and sent Adam away. They told him that the baby was coming whether he was ready or not, so he better get ready. He sent Adam away, assuring him he wasn't fired, before joining the class.

==Career==
Adam is an assistant. He said he's the second assistant, but hoped doing the class for Jack would help him move up.
